intro: Welcome to my little corner of the multiverse! This is where ideas come to life, dice roll their fates, and imagination meets code. Whether you're here for tabletop adventures, digital experiments, or just to peek behind the curtain of my creative playground, you're in the right place.
journey: For over eight years, I've been running game groups across countless worlds — from epic long-form campaigns to quick, chaotic one-shots. I've orchestrated board games, TTRPGs, and even video game sessions that blur the line between storytelling and strategy. Along the way, I've honed my skills in bringing people together, building systems, and exploring new creative frontiers — all while keeping a bit of fun and chaos in the mix.
mission: My mission is simple: to explore and create with curiosity, craft experiences that spark joy, and share knowledge with fellow adventurers and creators. Whether through coding, game design, or community-building, I aim to make spaces where imagination thrives and everyone feels welcome — like a safe haven for nerds, dreamers, and builders of worlds.
key_features: Tabletop & TTRPG Expertise: Long-form, short-form, and everything in between
Gaming Across Realms: Board games, video games, and mecha adventures
Coding & Tech Playground: Experimenting with web projects, AI, and tools
Community Focused: Supporting fellow creators and building inclusive spaces
Creative Storytelling: From epic fantasy to sci-fi mechas, and beyond
call_to_action: If my projects or stories bring a spark of joy or inspiration, your support keeps the gears turning. Even a small contribution helps me keep exploring, creating, and sharing — consider swinging by the Donations page if you're feeling generous!
